testcase.classname: Password segment on Homepage should be editable
testcase.name: TC_US8_001 The old password should not be used

testcase.classname: Password segment on Homepage should be editable
testcase.name: TC_US8_002 There should be at least 1 lowercase char for stronger password and
testcase.system-out: Given Click Current password................................................passed And Enter old password from tc1.............................................passed And Click New password......................................................passed And Enter new password with lowercase.......................................passed And Click New password confirmation.........................................passed And Re-enter new password with lowercase....................................passed And Click save..............................................................passed Then Verify the password with lowercase strength color......................passed

testcase.classname: Password segment on Homepage should be editable

testcase.classname: Password segment on Homepage should be editable
